item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-12-12
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-12-12.

This is the last meeting for 2023. Please respond to this poll for 2024 scheduling preferences.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-01
item.description:
The fourth HEIR meeting was 2023-08-01 (notes and video recording).

We’re also starting on the Poly and Secret dialects in #74 (poly) and #78 (secret), so please join in the fun!
